entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Timmins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:10 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -25.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 09:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -25.1°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -30.2°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 28 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
